definition[0]: something someone does, especially something that is very good or very bad

example[1]: She tried to strangle her baby and her lover helped her finish the evil deed.
definition[1]: an official paper that is a record of an agreement, especially an agreement concerning who owns property
definition[2]: a formal written document that is a record of an agreement, especially one relating to property
example[3]: The parties to a deed should sign it in the presence of a witness.
